arts.ttl: Millwall boss on ‘soft’ nature of Cardiff City winner
arts.sum: Neil Harris was left frustrated with the “soft” nature of the goal his Millwall side conceded in their 1-0 defeat at Cardiff on Tuesday night. “That’s my gripe with my team,” said Lions head coach Harris.

arts.ttl: ‘Worst league performance of the season’ - Millwall boss Harris reacts to setback at Cardiff City
arts.sum: Neil Harris felt his Millwall side produced their “worst league performance” of the season during their 1-0 defeat at Cardiff City tonight. The first goal was always going to be key in this contest with Cardiff yet to win and Millwall having failed to claim anything when they have conceded the opening goal this season.

arts.ttl: Bottom club Cardiff win first Championship game of the season against Millwall
arts.sum: Perry Ng scored only the third league goal of the season for Cardiff, who are now bottom of the table only on goal difference behind Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: Millwall defender hails front four after Preston attacking display
arts.sum: Left-back Bryan said: “Rom is getting the plaudits at the moment because he’s such a fantastic player and he’s improving every game. George Honeyman opened the scoring after 24 minutes when he finished off Macaulay Langstaff’s cross along the face of goal.
